name: #ProjectNoTale [Goon JR Fight] DEMO
description:
#ProjectNoTale created by Addison Kidd

Play as Cynthia in this demo battle against Goon Jr.

Fight by hitting the corresponding arrow key in the bullseye, and avoid Goon Jr from snatching your heart.

... Or take the pacifist route, and try to talk your way out of this one.

*NOTE* The game #ProjectNoTale is still early in development and this demo very much reflects that. The music is placeholder and is Bonetrousel by Toby Fox.
